name: achievement_points
displayName: I am One in a Million, and There Are Six Thousand People in the World Exactly Like Me

displayName: I Have Jumped Beyond the Powers of Two, and Have Lived to Tell the Tale

description: All fives. All five stars. On all levels. 81 levels. Yeah.

name: achievement_sun
displayName: Air. Wind. Sun. Pain. I Am All of This, and Your Mom Makes a Fine Pasta Dinner.
description: Complete the Summer Sun level from the main menu with 5 stars. Available for a limited time during Summer 2011! Hurry!
